Scope: General question about neutron/X-ray scattering
Context: Calculation
Q: I want to calculate the neutron absorption for my sample.
A: Please go to website, https://addie.ornl.gov/helpsheet. Available properties to be calculated include,

• neutron absorption
• neutron resonance absorption
• neutron scattering strength
• X-ray scattering strength
• weight of pair contribution in the overall scattering
• Faber Ziman coefficient
• self scattering level
